snippet: Tony winner Anika Noni Rose and nominees Raul Esparza, Judy Kuhn, Danny Burstein and Da’Vine Joy Randolph are among those starring in the inaugural show in the new Encores! Off-Center series.
abstract: Tony winner Anika Noni Rose and nominees Raul Esparza, Judy Kuhn, Danny Burstein and Da’Vine Joy Randolph are among those starring in the inaugural show in the new Encores! Off-Center series.

headline.main: Broadway Stars to Join Encores Series in 'Cradle Will Rock'
